| height = {{height|m=1.76}} | position = | currentclub = [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre]] | clubnumber = 27 | youthyears1= 2000â2004 | youthclubs1= Planete Champion | years1 = 2004â2005 | years2 = 2005â2006 | years3 = 2006â | years4 =2009 | clubs1 = [[Planete Champions Ouagadougou|Planete Champion]] | clubs2 = [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre B]] | clubs3 = [[AJ Auxerre|Auxerre]] | clubs4 =â [[Stade Brest 29|Brest]] (loan) | caps1 = 19 | goals1 = 7 | caps2 = 70 | goals2 = 21 | caps3 = 33 | goals3 = 10 | caps4 = 14 | goals4 = 3 | nationalyears1= 2006â | nationalteam1= [[Burkina Faso national football team|Burkina Faso]]<ref>{{nfteams|17306}}</ref> | nationalcaps1= 15 | nationalgoals1 = 7 | pcupdate = 29 May 2011 | ntupdate = }} '''Alain Sibiri TraorÃ©'''<ref>[http://www.footafrica365.fr/africains-de-l-etranger/angleterre/article_442454_Chelsea-Bertrand-Traore-a-signe.shtml Chelsea : Bertrand TraorÃ© a signÃ©]</ref> (born 31 December 1988 in [[Bobo Dioulasso]]) is a [[Burkina Faso|BurkinabÃ©]] [[football (soccer)|football]]er, who currently plays for [[AJ Auxerre]].<ref>[http://www.aja.fr/siteofficiel/fichejoueur.asp?Num=218 aja.fr]</ref>
== Career == TraorÃ© began his career with Planete Champion and was transferred in July 2005 to [[AJ Auxerre]]. On 4 January 2009, he was loaned out to [[Stade Brest 29]] for six months. He returned to AJ Auxerre on 31 June 2009.<ref>{{Lfpfr|first=Alain|last=TraorÃ©}}</ref>
